Year: 2007

Plot: Nora Wilder is freaking out. Everyone around her is in a relationship, is married, or has children. Nora is in her thirties, alone with job she&#039;s outgrown and a mother who constantly reminds her of it all. Not to mention her best friend Audrey&#039;s "perfect marriage". But after a series of disastrous dates, Nora unexpectedly meets Julien, a quirky Frenchman who opens her eyes to a lot more than love.
